name: 为什么是我？
summary: Kafka comes to post-Communist Romania in writer-director Tudor Giurgiu's third fiction feature. Why Me? is a thinly disguised dramatization of the life of Romanian state criminal prosecutor Cristian Panait, who died in shady circumstances in April 2002 after taking a stand against powerful vested interests. He was just 29. A Romanian, Bulgarian and Hungarian co-production, Why ...
